io.github.acciochris.Obstacle
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.dyn4j.collision.CollisionBody<org.dyn4j.dynamics.BodyFixture>, org.dyn4j.DataContainer, org.dyn4j.dynamics.PhysicsBody, org.dyn4j.geometry.Rotatable, org.dyn4j.geometry.Shiftable, org.dyn4j.geometry.Transformable, org.dyn4j.geometry.Translatable, org.dyn4j.Ownable
public class Obstacle extends SimulationBody
Represents an obstacle in a level. Extends SimulationBody.
Version:
May 30, 2025
Author:
Chris Liu, Anvesh Pattaje

  • Constructor Details

    • Obstacle

      public Obstacle(org.dyn4j.geometry.Convex shape, double x, double y, Color color, boolean canMove, String jT, String mT, int level)
      Construct a new Obstacle from various parameters.
      Parameters:
      shape - a Convex shape for the obstacle
      x - x coordinate of the obstacle
      y - y coordinate of the obstacle
      color - color of the obstacle
      canMove - boolean parameter for whether the obstacle can move
      jT - joint type for this obstacle
      mT - mass type for this obstacle

    • Obstacle

      public Obstacle(org.dyn4j.geometry.Convex shape, double x, double y, boolean canMove, int level)
      Simplified constructor for obstacles without colors or joints.
      Parameters:
      shape - a Convex shape for the obstacle
      x - x coordinate of the obstacle
      y - y coordinate of the obstacle
      canMove - boolean parameter for whether the obstacle can move
